interestingcomments.content: Maybe - but the flash is an afterthought straight from a 1970-ies compact, the design is horrendous with that small lens inside a soup plate and the back is full retro, to use a charitable expression. Designed and made in Rural China for Lomo... --img--  If they should bring out such a camera I do hope it will be slightly more sophisticated. It may be a rebadged/restyled Fuji, but at least Fuji came up with a nicer design.
